abstract_ssm: The images were included in When Brooklyn Was the World by Elliot Willensky, originally published by Crown Publishers in 1986. Images of buildings, people, transportation, neighborhoods, public events, recreation, and parks are included in the collection, as are images of Coney Island, and the New York Naval Shipyard (now the Brooklyn Navy Yard), among others.
